title: Hello
definition: Used as a greeting or to begin a conversation

title: World
definition: The earth, together with all of its countries and peoples
examples: The world is a big place.
We live in a diverse world.

title: Goodbye
definition: Used to express good wishes when parting or at the end of a conversation

title: Love
definition: An intense feeling of deep affection

title: Hate
definition: Feel intense or passionate dislike for someone

title: Peace
definition: Freedom from disturbance; tranquility
examples: Peace is the absence of war.

title: War
definition: A state of armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

title: Friend
definition: A person whom one knows and with whom one has a bond of mutual affection

title: Enemy
definition: A person who is actively opposed or hostile to someone or something

title: Life
definition: The condition that distinguishes animals and plants from inorganic matter, including the capacity for growth, reproduction, functional activity, and continual change preceding death

title: Death
definition: The action or fact of dying or being killed; the end of the life of a person or organism

title: Hope
definition: A feeling of expectation and desire for a particular thing to happen
examples: I hope for a better future.

title: Despair
definition: The complete loss or absence of hope

title: Faith
definition: Complete trust or confidence in someone or something

title: Doubt
definition: A feeling of uncertainty or lack of conviction
examples: I have doubts about this plan.

title: Joy
definition: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness

title: Sadness
definition: The condition or quality of being sad

title: Anger
definition: A strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility

title: Fear
definition: An unpleasant emotion caused by the belief that someone or something is dangerous, likely to cause pain, or a threat

title: Courage
definition: The ability to do something that frightens one
examples: Courage in the face of danger.

title: Ladder
definition: A structure consisting of a series of bars or steps between two upright lengths of wood, metal, or rope, used for climbing up or down something
